strategies.description: Automatic feature recognition and strategy selection

strategies.description: Full slot cutting with trochoidal motion

strategies.description: Compensated feed for thin chip at low engagement

strategies.description: Slot cutting via plunge and shift

strategies.description: VoluMill for 3D surfaces with optimal chip load

strategies.name: Optimized Constant Z
strategies.description: Variable Z step based on curvature

strategies.name: Blend Finishing
strategies.description: Blended surface finishing with smooth transitions between passes

strategies.name: Cleanup / Rest Finishing
strategies.description: Removes material left by larger tools in corners and tight areas

strategies.name: Constant Z / Z-Level
strategies.description: Horizontal slice machining at constant Z levels - ideal for steep walls

strategies.name: 3D Contour
strategies.description: Follows 3D contour of surface for uniform finish on complex shapes

strategies.name: Corner Finishing
strategies.description: Internal corner cleanup with optimized tool engagement

strategies.name: Flowline
strategies.description: Follows surface flow lines for optimal surface quality on complex shapes

strategies.name: Geodesic
strategies.description: Follows geodesic paths (shortest path on surface) for uniform stepover

strategies.name: Isocurve / Isoparametric
strategies.description: Follows surface UV isoparametric lines for natural flow on NURBS surfaces

strategies.name: Leftover Material Detection
strategies.description: Automatically detects and machines remaining material from previous operations

strategies.name: Morphed Spiral
strategies.description: Spiral pattern morphed to surface shape for continuous cutting

strategies.name: Optimized Z-Level
strategies.description: Z-level with variable stepdown optimized for surface curvature

strategies.name: Parallel Both Ways / Zigzag
strategies.description: Bidirectional parallel passes for faster cycle time

strategies.name: Parallel Finishing / Raster
strategies.description: Unidirectional parallel passes for consistent surface quality

strategies.name: Parallel Spiral
strategies.description: Combines parallel pattern with spiral connect moves

strategies.name: Pencil Trace
strategies.description: Traces along internal corners and fillets like a pencil in a groove

strategies.name: Pencil Trace Extended
strategies.description: Extended pencil trace with lead-in/out optimization

strategies.name: Radial Finishing
strategies.description: Radial passes from center outward - ideal for circular features

strategies.name: Rest Finishing
strategies.description: Finishes only areas with remaining stock from previous operations

strategies.name: Scallop / Constant Cusp
strategies.description: Maintains constant scallop height regardless of surface curvature

strategies.name: Shallow Area Machining
strategies.description: Machines only shallow/flat areas - pairs with steep machining

strategies.name: Steep Area Machining
strategies.description: Machines only steep/vertical areas - pairs with shallow machining

strategies.name: Steep & Shallow Combined
strategies.description: Automatic steep/shallow detection with optimized strategy per region

strategies.name: Waterline / Contour Z
strategies.description: Horizontal contour passes at constant Z - like water levels on a surface

strategies.name: 3D Contour Roughing
strategies.description: Roughing following 3D contour with constant stock allowance

strategies.name: Level Z Roughing
strategies.description: Z-level roughing with horizontal slice removal

strategies.name: Rest Roughing
strategies.description: Removes material left by larger roughing tool

strategies.name: General 3D Roughing
strategies.description: General purpose 3D roughing with multiple pattern options
